name: Zucchini with Chickpea and Mushroom Stuffing
author: jackie
summary: A great vegetable dish that can be used as a centerpiece or as a side. Can be lovely when served with tomato based sauce and a green vegetable, or I have even had them with traditional roasted vegetables at Christmas.
ingredients: ½ (8 ounce) package button mushrooms, sliced
1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin, or to taste
1 (15.5 ounce) can chickpeas, rinsed and drained
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Scoop out the flesh of the zucchini; chop the flesh and set aside
Place the shells in the prepared dish
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Saute onions for 5 minutes, then add garlic and saute 2 minutes more
Stir in chopped zucchini and mushrooms; saute 5 minutes
Stir in coriander, cumin, chickpeas, lemon juice, parsley, salt and pepper
Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 40 minutes, or until zucchini are tender
